website_summaries.verdict: The Ryka Dominion received a positive reception from most consumers. They adored the model for its comfortable feel, pleasing aesthetics, true-to-size fit, plush cushioning, and adequate arch support. That said, not everyone was fascinated with this pair. While some buyers noted that it fit as expected, plenty wrote that it ran too small and narrow for their liking. Naysayers also griped about the inferior materials and inadequate support. Overall, this trainer was considered a cozy and stylish walking shoe, despite its fit and durability issues.
pros: Many people were impressed by the comfort that the Ryka Dominion provided
Its stylish design appealed to numerous consumers
The model was ideal for gym training and weightlifting due to its flat heel, as stated by fitness aficionados
A small number of individuals found that it fit as expected
The shoe’s cushioning pleased some wearers
A couple of testers gave praise to its sufficient arch support
It had an ideal build for feet with flat arches, bone spurs, and plantar fasciitis, according to several reviewers
cons: A majority of critics complained that the trainer ran smaller and narrower than other Ryka shoes
Various detractors reported that the sole, the memory foam insert, and the toe guard easily deteriorated after a few months of use
A myriad of criticisms concerned insufficient support
Its stiff sole made the footwear uncomfortable, based on a few reviews

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size up
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of RYKA Ultimate Running shoes for two years and finally needed to replace them. Decided to try the Dominion Walking Shoe. My old RYKAs were a size 9 1/2 and fit perfectly. Ordered the Dominion in the same size and was disappointed by how much smaller and tighter they were than my old pair. Had to send them back. Ordered half a size up (size 10) and am very happy with the fit. These shoes feel so good and supportive in all the right places. I actually like the Dominion much better than my old pair. If questioning whether or not to order up half a size, I'd definitely recommend doing it.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for all day wear.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I gave these sneakers only 4 stars instead of the maximum 5 stars is because of the lack of a leather or synthetic toe guard. The toe guard is the same material that the rest of the sneaker is made of. Time will tell if it stands up the wear and tear of every day usage. Otherthan that, the sneakers are very comfortable, look good, and fit perfectly. If there was a different color offered, I would buy a second pair. They definitely live up to the RYKA standard that I am used to.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have numerous problems with my feet so that also means I have numerous problems finding a comfortable walking shoe. This has been by far the best shoe I have worn without screaming in pain after a 20 minute walk. Length of shoe fit perfectly. At first, I thought the width was a tad bit narrow but the mesh material stretches when you step and my feet have been fine. I also love the memory foam and has been the most cushioned shoe I have worn in a long time. I like this shoe so much I ordered another one in black. If you are looking for comfort and a nice looking shoe this is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: peppergirl

customer_reviews.title: Not for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for working out and they had really good reviews. Overall, they fit fine and did their job as a sneaker but I cannot say that they were good walking shoes. Rather, I think they tended to slip off and were somewhat bulky. The laces were also really short. For the price, I do not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen L

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: A tiny bit smaller than expected but still able to walk comfortably (toes feel a little cramped in the front). I feel like I'm walking on air in these shoes. The memory foam inside cushions well and I'm walking around all day. The design on the bottom is great because small pebbles can't get stuck. Will probably order more pairs in the future if the average life of my shoes are 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Locness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and so comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Im in love. Finding comfortable shoes for my busy mom life has been a daunting task. We live in an urban area and walk a lot or use public transportation so its not uncommon to walk 3 to 5 miles a day. These shoes are amazing right out of the box! I remeasured my feet using a guide on Ebay and ordered a 10 Wide. I have never ordered a 10 Wide in my life. 9 1/2 W or 10. But now I am a believer. These are perfect! The plain black is stylish for super casual mom days.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bird

customer_reviews.title: Too Short A Life Span
customer_reviews.text: Well I have other pairs of Ryka I love. This pair is not one of them. 1.5 months and the sole is coming apart. Try a different brand or style ...
customer_reviews.author: MichelleT

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Size
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like and keep this shoe but I found it very hard to get the correct size. I tried my usual size and found that to be too small. Then I ordered a half size up and found that to not fit correctly. I also tried my regular size in a wide width but still couldn't get the right fit. I ended up ordering the Ryka Devotion2 Walking shoe and that fit perfect like most of my Ryka's do.
customer_reviews.author: moog718

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but a bit small and narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka shoes and have worn them almost exclusively since I tried my first pair years ago. I love the color combination and look of this pair, but I must say they are among the Ryka styles that run a bit small and narrow. It will take awhile to break them in--my feet are a little numb and my heels burn after my first walk in them, but I know based on previous experience they'll eventually feel better. They do have good arch support. I usually wear a size 7M, which is what I bought, but for this style I'd probably need a 7.5 for them to be comfortable out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: debonline

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable sneakers i have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sneakers i have ever worn. I had bought the blue pair first and then 2 weeks later bought the black pair. If there were more colors i would buy each of those also.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I'd hoped for
customer_reviews.text: The shipper sent me two right foot shoes. For $124.00 I'd expect to receive a right AND a left shoe. I did try the one shoe on--it was tight in the toes. I also wasn't impressed with the material it was made of. It felt like the webbing you buy to repair your lawn chairs. To be perfectly honest, I'm just as happy to have returned them and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne M. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! I have very wide feet near the toes, which taper back to "normal" size in the heel - these shoes fit my shape perfectly! I also have toes that curl upwards, requiring shoes with a deep toe box - these Rykas have plenty of wiggle room in the toes area. the soles are the right amount of squishy. There is arch support, but it doesn't quite reach my high arches. I love how lightweight these are and how easily they slide on and off. (I wear and ordered the 8.5 w)
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe, runs small/narrow
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Ryka shoes, very comfortable. These on the other hand, ran small, and very narrow. I would order a size up and wide. The memory foam insole was not attached to the inside of shoe, so every time you take your shoes off, the insole came out every time. The shoe is stylish, just not as comfortable as most of their shoes. The shoes do tie, it may not look like it in the picture, but they do.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I walk as my primary exercise
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I walk as my primary exercise. These fit so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: madrinam

customer_reviews.title: Ageless Comfort.
customer_reviews.text: My Rykas are so comfortable that this is the second pair I've bought. As I am aging my foot is wider and I have a bunion to deal with. At 76 I'm still active enough to wear sneakers. I walk my two dogs three times a day and I have to have comfortable shoes. The memory foam interior is comfy and the sole has enough spring to lessen impact. Young or a senior, I think you would like them. And priced reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: m k wigley

customer_reviews.title: comfy and cute walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a family vacation that involved a lot of walking. They are very comfortable with plenty of cushion. My feet are a wee bit on the narrow side, and these fit perfectly through the heel and mid-foot, with ample room in the toe box. And they don't look half-bad. This is my first pair of Ryka's (I usually buy Adidas), but it won't be my last.
customer_reviews.author: 5inthehall

customer_reviews.title: Peple with RA get these!!! Life savers!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy! The memory foam bed is like heaven right out of the box. I have RA & when I discovered Ryka several years ago I was floored at how these shoes made my life manageable again. I remember I could barley walk when I slipped a pair of ryka on at Marshalls & it seriously took most of the pain away, they were bright white & the ugliest shoes I've ever seen but I didn't give a sh*t. I wore those to the bone! Several pairs later I'm still exceptionally pleased. I feel they do run a bit small, I wear a 8 to 8.5 and I always get a size 9 when purchasing Ryka.
customer_reviews.author: cryjoy

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite Ryka style
customer_reviews.text: I actually returned these shoes. Unlike AVIA brand which always fit true to size and are instantly comfortable, these shoes were tight across the top and as others have mentioned, the memory foam feature was awkward to me as well. I wanted to like them because the colors and style are pleasing to the eye, but I couldn't justify the cost with my lack of satisfaction in fit..
customer_reviews.author: Lori S

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable. Runs exactly a half size small.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best athletic shoes I’ve evah worn. New forever brand. Seriously. I supinate a good amount and I’ve spent the majority of my working life on my feet. As I get older and fatter, my feet are like two bricks of pain. No kidding, the first time I wore these shoes I forgot I had them on! Hours later I was all, “holy crap! I’ve been wearing these all day and my feet feel amazing!”. They run a half size up, exactly and get them. You will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cramer

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 sizes to see what worked LOVE RYKA!!! Thank you for still existing
customer_reviews.text: I thought Ryka was gone .... bankrupt years ago.... Thank HEAVENS they are still around. Found by accident when searching for a match to my Mom's old 883 New Balance. Ryka may run 1/2 size small. LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE. HAPPY to find them again. The best to make my feet happy. I will use different arch supports. I don't like the cloud feel I want transverse & metatarsal solid arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Na

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday shoe, runs small
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Ryka shoes for years. I'm on my feet a lot at work and use my orthodics in them. It is true they run small, I get one size larger. Next timei might also get wide. Only issue I have is shoelaces are too short. Not sure who they're basing shoe size off of?! But all in all it's a good everyday shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: They are good quality and attractive shoes
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are not WIDE. The fabric of the upper part of the shoe is a little looser than usual. They are good quality and attractive shoes. However if you really NEED wide shoes do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: m.e. brack

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe! I have had problems with plantar fasciitis ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe! I have had problems with plantar fasciitis in the past but not with this shoe. Fabulous cushioning. I wear it for cross training, walking and step aerobics. Love it!! My non-athletic shoe size is a 7 1/2 but I order an 8 1/2 in athletic shoes and the 8 1/2 was perfect. I do have a somewhat narrow foot so this might not work for anyone with a wide foot unless it comes in a wide width.
customer_reviews.author: Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but DON’T LAST!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and breathable, however, sole is detaching after only 4 months of intermittent wear. I’d purchase again IF they lasted longer, but sadly I’ll be on the hunt again for another shoe by another manufacturer. Overpriced for the longevity that’s for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Bad review
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this shoe. It took a few weeks which is why I rarely write reviews but I dislike these shoe so much I had to write one. My feet hurt constantly while wearing them now and more particularly right at the balls of my feet and the insoles constantly slip, and I have clomp to my step that wasn't there before. I would burn them if I had not wasted good money on them. Now I have to shell out more money for different shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazingly comfortable and supportive walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly comfortable and supportive walking shoe, perfect for city walking. I took them out of the box, walked around the house for a few minutes then took them outside for an hour long walk with the dogs. Love them!! I've had them for a week and they still feel great!
customer_reviews.author: double10ski

customer_reviews.title: The toe box is narrow which I love. It makes my feet feel very secure in ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9 and these fit perfectly. The toe box is narrow which I love. It makes my feet feel very secure in the shoe. I use these as my aerobic/dance shoes and I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love RYKA tennies and these shoes do not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fit, nice support. Love the gray color. I had the black Dominion previously and completely wore them out because they were so comfy for both walking and for training in a studio. I wear an 8 normally and ordered an 8 previously and this time as well. At first I thought they might be a little snug, but after wearing around the house a couple hours they stretched a bit and now feel perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Allen

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy style, but WIDE too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style and fit, but there is room for improvement. The width still feels narrow as if my little toe continues to cling desparetely onto the platform while at the same time my big is pushed towards the center of my toes. I realize that design-wise it looks flattering, but my feet need room to spread a bit when walking and standing.
customer_reviews.author: AT-AT KS250

customer_reviews.title: I have worn many pairs of Ryka sneakers and like the way they fit
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made. I have worn many pairs of Ryka sneakers and like the way they fit. It is great to have your suggestions of when to size up etc. Very attractive coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather with arch support
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, good arch support. Great for walking. I have 1 narrow and 1 normal width feet. They fit me perfectly but would say they may be too narrow for someone with a wide foot. The pink is a little much. Why are sneakers the colors of clown shoes?
customer_reviews.author: CindyCK

customer_reviews.title: Good consistent fit
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering Ryka brand as walking shoes on line and the size is always consistent. Because I walk about 3.5-8.0 miles per day it is important the shoes fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne M. Jagers

customer_reviews.title: color
customer_reviews.text: the shoes are a perfect fit and very comfortable and though i really like the color when i saw them on the screen they looked more black and dark blue in reality they are a brighter blue with less black than appears in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!!!
customer_reviews.text: Too short by full size & too narrow in 9W. Lightweight and cushioned.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Fit better than I thought they would.
customer_reviews.text: Like how the shoe hugs my foot. I haven't worn them to Jazzercise class yet, but hopefully not too much side to side movement in the toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey A Eager

customer_reviews.title: These shoes do provide a comfortable step.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual size. The shoes feel a little snug, but I am supposing the will break in a bit as most do. These shoes do provide a comfortable step.
customer_reviews.author: L.D. Clements

customer_reviews.title: These are super comfortable, but very little support
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable, but very little support. That's the balance with these sorts of "cushy" shoes. I bought them 1/2 size above my street shoe, same size as my running shoes. VERY comfortable, but don't expect support.
customer_reviews.author: realblonde94526

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were either mismarked or the worlds smallest pair of size 9 women's. Fit my sister who wears an 8.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Light on MY feet.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fit and how light they are. They’re great no breaking in time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers for all-day wear!
customer_reviews.text: Wore them ‘out of the box 📦’. So comfortable that I bought two more pairs in different color combinations. Wear them ALL day in pure comfort!!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Saitzeff Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Great inner sole plus more!
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled! I was pleasantly surprised to find memory foam in the sole of these shoes. They are awesome! I have a painful foot due to a Morton's Neuroma and could not even walk around the house without limping. Now I put these on in the morning and go about my day just fine. Thank you Ryka! Great shoes that really saved me until I have surgery!
customer_reviews.author: Baba's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are like walking on air. They make the difference of my walking for fun or walking in pain just to get around the house and grocery store. I can walk at my faster pace without consequences. These shoes rock!
customer_reviews.author: Betsey_Ross

customer_reviews.title: just as described
customer_reviews.text: my new ryka dominion arrived today they are awesome! i generally wear 7-1/2 medium width thats what i ordered and thats what i got! not too snug or too lose fit is just right! oh and they're pretty just like pic would buy again thanks ryka!
customer_reviews.author: toni s.

customer_reviews.title: One small issue with this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes except for one thing. the tongue of the shoe is not very stiff and, on my foot, it rolls toward the middle and was uncomfortable. I bought some flat pieces of self-adhesive moleskin and put it on the inside of the tongue. it gave it enough stiffness to stop the rolling and I am enjoying using these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Historymajor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have owned. I have bunions and it is hard to find good shoes that support your feet and cause no pain. These are it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ellis

customer_reviews.title: arch support
customer_reviews.text: I still needed to put an arch support in them, because I have a high instep. Overall, no more hip pain from my morningwalks. they fit great and I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not for my feet
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was confortable but felt very flat which is intended but I could not walk properly in these shoes. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: RuthR

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love Ryka walking shoes. Light weight and comfortable. Bought and used for fitness walking.
customer_reviews.author: Love to shop

customer_reviews.title: order a half size up!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and great looking shoe. The fit is narrow and somewhat small. I wear a 9 and could have used a 9.5 ...... I have narrow feet. Love the memory foam insoles.
customer_reviews.author: vicky

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected and look very nice. Not as comfortable as i expected though
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and look very nice. Not as comfortable as i expected though. Ended up wearing a couple times, then switching back to my adidas.
customer_reviews.author: SpontaneousUniq

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Have to wear it for a longer period of walk, and will update if needed
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing, like walking on a cloud. They are super lightweight, yet supportive. The arch support is amazing, I have very high arches and these make walking long distances so much more comfortable. The only thing I would say, go to Ryka's website and print out their size chart; I used this and determined I needed to buy a size 9, as opposed to my usual size 8. Overall, would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable! I walk daily, and these shoes are great! I also like their looks as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fit nis great.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this same shoe for years. That should speak for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Luv to read

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your $! Very,very thin and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible! Felt as if I was walking on pavement with bare feet. Very, very thin. I ordered a wide width for both pairs ordered and they fit like a narrow width. Don’t waste your money. Sending these to the thrift store!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hauglum

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! Um on my feet all day
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Um on my feet all day. With prior shoes, my legs would just ache. I come home after a long day and I could still keep going.
customer_reviews.author: K. Deeter

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and my regular size 9 and 1/2 wide and I can barely get my foot in them I was very disappointed I must say
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Insole slides and moves and you end up standing on ...
customer_reviews.text: Insole slides and moves and you end up standing on the edge off it and it really hurts your feet And that's besides all the sticky stuff that you ha e all over the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Izhak Shmueli

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoes. Bought them to wear when teaching a ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent shoes. Bought them to wear when teaching a summer camp. Got me through a long day, but I had to switch off with another pair - hurt a bit after 9 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Brass

customer_reviews.title: These shoes hurt my feet .Uncomfortable to wear after 4 hrs.
customer_reviews.text: the heel area ached after wearing.needed to buy 2 heel gel inserts. would of returned but need full black shoes for job.thought maybe would improve if broken in more. it has not. Unfortunately I bought several pairs.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Fourth purchase
customer_reviews.text: This the fourth pair of these sneakers I’ve bought and will continue to buy. So comfortable, wears for a long time, and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: So far great!! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight....not used to that but the memory foam is awesome and I’m getting used to it being lighter then my previous sneakers!! I wear them for my job that’s on my feet and for every day use however only bad thing is there mesh so not so good in the rain but just don’t wear them in the rain haha 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Kara K.

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: Shoe feels smaller than other Rykas bought in the same size.. ended up with blisters .. won't wear them for long walks or long days anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Tsirikos

customer_reviews.title: These made my Mom's day as she has gotten older ...
customer_reviews.text: These made my Mom's day as she has gotten older - 88, her feet have gotten wider and bunions are a pain. She was ecstatic with how well they fit!
customer_reviews.author: Bronk

customer_reviews.title: I always buy 8 1/2 wide in ryka's these were ...
customer_reviews.text: I always buy 8 1/2 wide in ryka's these were to tight and smaller would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cushioning!
customer_reviews.text: The cushioning is great. Can walk forever. I hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent,  fit, comfortable,  and priced reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Walking, excellent walking shoes. Fits well. Only shoes I buy for walking. No negatives!
customer_reviews.author: patricia beckham

customer_reviews.title: Order down a half size
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8 but went down to a 7 1/2 and it fit perfectly. Very comfortable, washes well and good walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Frandson

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, super light
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are sooo light. Fit perfectly to my foot, and memory foam is very comfortable. They run small. This is the first time I considered getting a 9 in my life. I usually wear 7 1/2 dress, 8 boot, 8 1/2 sneaker. Will definitely get again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for City Walking
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair before this from Ryka so I assumed I could get the same size. They were a little small but I like snug shoes. They stretched pretty quickly. They feel great walking in them. Super comfortable. Perfect for city walking.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. They fit fine, are attractive, and competively priced
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Geo Man

customer_reviews.title: Soles are tearing up after only 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: I received these shoes on April 25, today September 4th the sole is starting to tear. I do wear them a lot but the shoe still still looks almost new. I am very disappointed as I really like this shoe and comfortable wide women’s shoes that look good are VERY hard to find!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size for me - I am an 8. Very comfortable right out of the box - Big fan of these!
customer_reviews.author: P Kleiner

customer_reviews.title: The brand fits foot very good.  Style I want fits a little better.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is not style I want but will do. I order the proper style but a sub was sent
customer_reviews.author: Margaret  a smith

customer_reviews.title: Fit my wide toe base
customer_reviews.text: I removed the inner pad and repaced it with a high arch insole, these are a perfect fit even with my narrow heel and wide toe base.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal The Pistol

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, long lasting well made
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long distance walker. I have purchased RYKA before. Great shoe, long lasting well made. Comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: sandra k clifford

customer_reviews.title: They feel great all day
customer_reviews.text: had to return first pair but second came with no troubles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All I can say that those shoes are COMFORTABLE They have also great support
customer_reviews.author: Grenouilles

customer_reviews.title: Great style and a great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it did not have a noticeable heal. I can not have a heal in my shoes. I removed the insole even though it felt so comfortable, and replaced it with a Protalus insole. The most comfortable shoes for me with neuropathy and a sub talar fusion.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Olson

customer_reviews.title: The life of the shoe is extremely short. ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 3 pair now. Thinking maybe I got a bad pair the first time. But they’re great for maybe a week and a half to 2 weeks and then the soles wear out and the insoles actually detach from the shoe, flatten and completely lose shape and cushion. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Rue

customer_reviews.title: I tried on Ryka shoes at Shoe Carnival, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried on Ryka shoes at Shoe Carnival, but they didn’t have the rezorb sole. I have to buy a 1/2 size larger than I normally wear in Ryka shoes. The rezorb is a fabulously comfy sole!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D Orf

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for walking very comfortable. Fits perfect. I would have given a 5 but the toe box clicks when I walk sometimes due to the protective layer for the toe
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Soo comfortable. The memory foam make the footbed very soft. Decreases my foot pain considerably. Every day shoes.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for my 6.5 wide foot. Love the memory foam and cushioned sole for my plantar fasciitis. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect walking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes comfortable and look good. I wore my first pair out after about three years and just replaced them with the same style. Love them! Perfect for walking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but doesnt last long.
customer_reviews.text: Soles are starting to fall off after only 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: This product was such a disappointment. It was too small and it looked cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sneakers, but they run small; buyan extra half size larger.
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful but too flat, not deep enough due to the inserted memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Valbrune

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Very comfortable. I’m on my feet for 8 hours at work and they definitely have helped my back pain diminish.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were too narrow and too short. I plan to return or sell.
customer_reviews.author: sheilakay winski

customer_reviews.title: Re-zorb is great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the re-zorb system. It really makes walking more comfortable. This is my second pair and I will only buy Ryka in the future.
customer_reviews.author: dbcpa

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes hurt my legs and feet! I’ve never had this problem with a pair of shoes. They give me horrible shin splints.
customer_reviews.author: shelleycms

customer_reviews.title: I love the fit and the comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three pairs of this shoe. I love the fit and the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Luv to read

customer_reviews.title: My arthritis doesn't act up!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a job at the local post office and I walk many miles in a day. I needed something that would be able to support me while doing my job. So far, there are no complaints. My feet do not hurt at the end of the day which is a huge plus for me!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: excellent running
customer_reviews.text: exact shoe for running, weightless, literally you feel no stress no weight when you run, excellent running shoe
customer_reviews.author: Maya B.

customer_reviews.title: Liked the gray color and style but was surprised how ...
customer_reviews.text: Liked the gray color and style but was surprised how narrow the shoe was Ordered 6 medium but shoe was so narrow couldn’t get it on.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cushion sole is already wearing out and have only worn to work for three days

customer_reviews.title: I really like them.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are definitely for distance walking. I really like them.

customer_reviews.title: I have trouble finding a good fit. These shoes were perfect for me and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble finding a good fit. These shoes were perfect for me and comfortable to wear right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. It's very comfortable and I've gotten some nice compliments on the appearance. I had to go up 1/2 size in this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: almasyj

product_meta.title: RYKA Women's Dominion Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: Building on a heritage construction, the dominion features a jacquard knitted upper with supportive midfoot cage design and a smooth lycra collar for comfort. The lightweight molded eva features a full length re-zorb platform and a popular network of proprietary re-zorb® active foam.
feature_bullets: Jacquard upper with smooth lycra collar for comfort
Memory foam with latex base to prevent the sock liner from staying compressed, providing support all day
Lightweight molded eva features a full length resorb platform; external pod network between midsole and outsole, and full length internal insert
Eight-piece radiused skeletal rubber works simultaneously with the re-zorb midsole and cobblestone engineering
